Articles.Content:
I did some checking and the Squad website which is almost impossible for me to read since it's in Spanish but I pressed on aimlessly looking when I stumbled on a video of KSP... their VERY first video... with KSP back in before I'd say... I don't know... .8? Maybe earlier?

I just noticed and like to suggest that if someone could help them make a new one for 1.0 that I'm certain someone wouldn't mind making it and therefore give Squad a more honest video of their hard work .

Ignore all posts about previous thread topic

Edited February 10, 2015 by ZooNamedGames
That's curious... I don't see the "1.0", "Beta than Ever" is the name of 0.90.

*facepalm* thanks carl. Made me realize the obvious- gotta change the thread anyway.

Edited February 10, 2015 by ZooNamedGames

I cannot wait to see the new update

I love KSP but unfortunately i don't have time to enjoy it due i writing my MA Thesis
